title.rendered: Institute for road safety and transport research

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]PRELIMINARY ANALYSIS OF CIRCULATION AND MOBILITY IN DARDANIA NEIGHBORHOOD WITH RECOMMENDATIONS.

The project envisages the widening of several roads, arranging parking lots, arranging pedestrian paths. For the first time in Prishtina, in the Dardania neighborhood, a bicycle lane will be laid according to the respective standards.

This project is donated to the Municipality of Pristina the Traffic Plan along with recommendations for the largest neighborhood of the city of Pristina.

URBAN MOBILITY PLANS FOR MUNICIPALITIES OF GILAN, PODUJEVE, FERIZAJ AND GRAÇANICA ARE CONCLUDED.

This project of sustainable urban mobility plans is for the municipalities of Gjilan, Podujeva, Ferizaj and Gracanica.

Urban plans, in addition to presenting the current situation in traffic and transportation in the respective municipalities, also consist of the implementation of the necessary measures in the short-term, medium-term and long-term planning periods. At the end of each urban plan, summaries of measures for urban public transportation, traffic safety, road infrastructure, active movements, environmental protection and parking management are presented.

“TRAFFIC SURVEYS FOR “WB17-KOS-TRA-02″: REHABILITATION AND CONSTRUCTION OF RAILWAY LINE PRISTINA-AIRPORT: FS AND ESIA”

This project is in progress
[/vc_column_text][vc_gallery interval=”5″ images=”4942,4941″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
